full_text: SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA THE BOARD OF PUBLIC EDUCATION PARKWAY AT TWENTY-FIRST STREET ZONE 3 ASSISTANT DIRECTORS ALLEN H. WETTER EMILIE RANNELLS SUPERINTENDENT OF SCHOOLS COUNSELING ROBERT C. TABER, DIRECTOR CLARA B. BRYANT DIVISION OF PUPIL PERSONNEL AND COUNSELING PUPIL PERSONNEL HELEN F. FAUST VOCATIONAL GUIDANCE June 7, 1963 To Whom It May Concern: Records on file in the Philadelphia School District indicate that employment certificate #31100 was issued to: HYMAN GETZ - son of Solomon and Celia Getz, on 3-19-18. Birth date is June 3, 1903, and last school attended was the Blaine. Place of birth was Russia. Very truly yours, Johns c. (rl) Robert C. Taber Director EXHIBIT / Exhibit Identification Form G166-B (1-1-94) GPO 874-436
